articles.title: Google Search charged with breaking EU antitrust rules - The Verge
articles.description: Google is violating the DMA by favoring its own search services over rival comparison providers, according to the European Commission.
articles.content:
The search giant is violating the DMA by giving its Shopping, Hotels, and Flights services preferential treatment.
